# BLAS.ThreadingModel

**Structure**

Constants that describe the BLAS and LAPACK threading model.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ThreadingModel
```

## Overview

Use the threading model constants to specify whether BLAS and LAPACK operations run in a single thread or multiple threads. Specify the single-threaded model if your app uses its own threading mechanism.

## Specifying a threading model

- **multiThreaded**: A constant that specifies that the Accelerate framework decides whether BLAS and LAPACK execute on single or multiple threads.
- **singleThreaded**: A constant that specifies BLAS and LAPACK execute on a single thread only.

## Setting the BLAS and LAPACK threading model

- **threadingModel**: The BLAS and LAPACK threading model.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- RawRepresentable
